title: "The End" script at the end of a movie
content:
Hi Everybody

I’m trying to find something that looks similar to this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706172546im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/the_end_small_2_6087.png)

Any ideas?

Thanks

Clinton

 [‹ (x) Letters on Amstrad CPC computer keys (1984) - similar to Bryant {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706172546/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44119 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Finch logo fat script - Candy Script {Akira} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706172546/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44116 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cisfor

comments.content:
This is hand-drawn, but I’d recommend [Feel Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706172546/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000300#characters) if you want that swashy kind of look.

- Lex

I think you’ll find similar stuff from [Alejandro Paul](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706172546/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Alejandro%252BPaul) at [FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706172546/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/designer/alejandro_paul/) or [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706172546/http:/www.veer.com/search/results.aspx?keyword=alejandro%20paul&producttype=TYP&pricemodel=RM%2CRF), and from [Jason Walcott](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706172546/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Jason%252BWalcott), also at [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706172546/http:/www.veer.com/search/results.aspx?keyword=jason%20walcott%20script&producttype=TYP&pricemodel=RM%2CRF).
